ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description:
This package makes writing Globus scripts and clients a
breeze! Easily setup token management and local server
login with a few lines of code. Easily extend components
as your app grows and requires its own config.
about.summary: Provides Native App login and token storage for multiple providers

about.description:
This package makes writing Globus scripts and clients a
breeze! Easily setup token management and local server
login with a few lines of code. Easily extend components
as your app grows and requires its own config.
about.summary: Provides Native App login and token storage for multiple providers

name: fair-research-login
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "fair-research-login" %}
{% set version = "0.3.1" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: eeccc8c77e509fa18e3940fa12c09822aaa68bae6dae9f481426ed3d4f469cc0

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - pip
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - globus-sdk

test:
  imports:
    - fair_research_login
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}

about:
  home: https://github.com/fair-research/native-login
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_family: Apache
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Provides Native App login and token storage for multiple providers

  description: |
    This package makes writing Globus scripts and clients a 
    breeze! Easily setup token management and local server 
    login with a few lines of code. Easily extend components 
    as your app grows and requires its own config.
  doc_url: https://github.com/fair-research/native-login
  dev_url: https://github.com/fair-research/native-login

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - jan-janssen
